Package zebra4j

zebra4j is a generator and solver for Zebra puzzles, a type of "logic grid puzzles". Such libraries are used as backend of interactive games aimed at children of all ages. Demo and unit tests demonstrate how to use the library. Learn even more about the library in README.md.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Attribute
    A known attribute for a person like a specific "name", "pet" or if the person is criminal
    Attributes
    A library of people attributes, demonstrating different ways to define them.
    AttributeType
    A type attribute for a person like a "name", "pet" or if the person is a criminal
    Localization
